column1: Little Goat Diner////I feel like everything here tastes amazing at first bite and then gets progressively worse the more you eat it. The nachos were good
column2: the patty melt was essentially oil with a bit of meat and onions
column3: and the smoked fries were simply nothing special. The decor is cute
column4: the location is great. The service was disjointed. We sat outside and that seemed to confuse the wait-staff some
column5: not to mention that we were all but forgotten at some point. Also
column6: our server was extremely cocky--certainly too much of an attitude for my and my group's tastes.
